```{python echo=TRUE}

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn.cluster import KMeans
from sklearn.metrics import silhouette_score
from yellowbrick.cluster import SilhouetteVisualizer
import pandas as pd
shopping_original=pd.read_csv('./data/Shopping_Data.csv')
# Examine data
shopping_original.head()

shopping_original
shopping_df = shopping_original.drop(columns="CaseNo")
shopping_df

cluster_range = range(1, 10)
cluster_errors = []
for num_clusters in cluster_range:
    clusters=KMeans(num_clusters)
    clusters.fit(shopping_df)
    cluster_errors.append(clusters.inertia_)
    
plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
plt.plot(cluster_range,cluster_errors,marker="o")
plt.show()

#Silhouette width for 7 cluster solution
clusters2=KMeans(7)
visualizer = SilhouetteVisualizer(clusters2)
visualizer.fit(shopping_df)
#show the plot
visualizer.show()


k=3
model=KMeans(k).fit(shopping_df)
print(model)
print(model.labels_)
centroids=model.cluster_centers_
print(centroids)
shopping_df["clusterid"]=model.labels_

#First Cluster
shopping_df[shopping_df.clusterid==0]
#Second
shopping_df[shopping_df.clusterid==1]
#Third
shopping_df[shopping_df.clusterid==2]
```
